DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.Id, T1.GroupingId, T4.value LongIndex, T5.value ShortIndex, T1.ShortPayTenor, T7.value SpreadOnShort, T8.value IncludeSpread, T9.value SubPeriodsCouponType FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsTenorBasisSwap T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName T4 ON T1.LongIndex = T4.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName T5 ON T1.ShortIndex = T5.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T7 ON T1.SpreadOnShort = T7.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T8 ON T1.IncludeSpread = T8.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesSubPeriodsCouponType T9 ON T1.SubPeriodsCouponType = T9.value

field.name: *LongIndex
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value LongIndex,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *ShortIndex
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value ShortIndex,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: SpreadOnShort
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value SpreadOnShort, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: IncludeSpread
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value IncludeSpread, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: SubPeriodsCouponType
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value SubPeriodsCouponType,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesSubPeriodsCouponType !T! ORDER BY value
